item.title: LowPower
item.description: Characteristics of low-power systems Periodic operation. Key points from a software point-of-view Mostly off Appropriate application model that allows a low-power mode of operation. Asunchronous APIs that allow slow response. Spend the most time possible in the deepest possible sleep mode (preferably powered-off). Start-up quickly Shutdown quickly Turn on as few devices as possible for the job at hand. Turn off the devices (or place them into low-power mode) as soon as the need for them is complete.
